data.title: Britannia Industries Customer Service Phone Number +91 447 153 6000, Email, Help Center
data.meta_description: How to contact Britannia Industries customer support at feedback or headquarters phone number? Call or write an email to resolve Britannia Industries issues: Product/ Service, Request for Information, Employment. Visit the company website britannia.co.in or help center for more information.
data.text:
Britannia Industries Customer Service is rated at 1.9 out of 5. Consumers who contact the company are mostly dissatisfied. More commonly used way of contact is by phone.

Source Distribution

80% phone 20% email

The best phone number to call Britannia Industries is 914471536000. 30% of consumers used this number to address their issues and concerns.

The longest wait times are on Friday, while the shortest are on Sunday.

People call Britannia Industries mainly because of product/ service, request for information and employment.
